title: Film Noir style Typography
content: I am making a book trailer which I am in need for 1940's style typography Film Noir. I just wondering what is the name of style and if I can download them?
author: ninfilms

comments.content:
Film Noir refers to a style of moviemaking, not a font style. Those movies used a variety of different fonts popular in that time period. This subject was discussed recently:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/115660](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804042312/http:/typophile.com/node/115660 "http://typophile.com/node/115660")
